channel.title: utah on Places
channel.description: Recent content in utah on Places

item.title: Zion National Park, Utah
item.description: For all our shared photos while in Utah, see our Photo Gallery at /places/gallery/ut Only One Thing to Say: GO! I could use all sorts of superlatives, and heap all sorts of praise, on how great Zion National Park is. And it would all be true. But I’d be articulating poorly what so many other writers, artists, outdoor enthusiasts, etc. have, in the past, stated better. Instead, I’ll let the photos speak for themselves.

item.title: Vineyard, Utah
item.description: For all our shared photos while in Utah, see our Photo Gallery at /places/gallery/ut The Newly Minted City We arrived in Vineyard, Utah at the start of December 2020. We came here to visit family living in the Salt Lake City area. Too, a few friends we know spoke highly of SLC, and how it’s becoming a popular destination for people looking for tech jobs. So we figured a two-week stay outta cover our family visit– and our curiosity to see why it’s so attractive.
